description.narrative: The Project is expected to have high development impact in the following areas: (i) Supporting SMEs and agricultural development: Many African economies are highly reliant on the sale to and purchase from international markets for many strategic crops, foodstuffs and commodities to support their economic growth. By financing these suppliers and buyers, Barak provides critical liquidity to allow SMEs in agricultural and other value chains to support growth, increase employment and reduce poverty; (ii) Increasing access to finance for low-income and fragile/conflict-affected markets: Barak's on-the-ground presence in Sub-saharan African countries and extensive experience in structured trade products, the fund is able to offer specialized financial products to clients and markets that are underserved by traditional bank credit. The Project will enable Barak to extend additional financing in these hard-to-reach segments and markets.
